pkgmetadata.longdescription: Utilities for Interacting with the 'RStudio Connect' Server API // Provides a helpful 'R6' class and methods for interacting with the 'RStudio Connect' Server API along with some meaningful utility functions for regular tasks. API documentation varies by 'RStudio Connect' installation and version, but the latest documentation is also hosted publicly at https://docs.rstudio.com/connect/api/.
